api_list.name: get_realtime_categories
api_list.description: Please be noted that 'realtime_categories' is the static category mapping based on 31.03.2022.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendnxt-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_realtime_categpries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendnxt-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_interest_over_time
api_list.description: Get Interest over time of google trends. Gives last 5 yrs result.

api_list.name: get_countries
api_list.description: Get advance country list from all over the world

api_list.name: get_google_categories
